modName: Frost and Rain Lens Effects for NLVA and SNOWFALL ENB.
summary: Adds rain and frost effect to the NLVA ENB.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]For NLVA USERS :[u][b]YOU MUST ENABLE LENS IN THE ENB GUI OR ENBSERIES.INI AND SAVE.
[/b][/u]
Download it here :[/b][/u] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/?
[/url]
These files add rain and frost lens effects for NLVA ENB like this ([u][b]MY EFFECTS ARE NOT PROPERLY TWEAKED, please do so in the ENBGUI[/b][/u], in the enblens.fx tab) [u][b]
[/b][/u]
Contains an enberies folder, just drag and drop it to your skyrim folder and overwrite when prompted.
The files are :
- Enblens.fx, enblens.fx.ini and enbweathermap.bmp from the Rampage ENB optional Files, Courtesy of my friend Myloween.
- Empty enblensmask.png in order to suppress the lens effects when looking at a lighting source. (optional)
- _weatherlist.ini from NLVA, tweaked by me in order to have the rain weathers and snow weathers grouped.

[u][b]Version 3.0 removes other lens effects to keep the colors true to the NLVA. (Slight color change when enabling lens)[/b][/u]
Did a lot of mistakes in 2.0, please download this one instead.

Please let me know if there is any issue.

[u][b]For SNOWFALL USERS : YOU MUST ENABLE LENS IN THE ENB GUI OR ENBSERIES.INI AND SAVE.

[/b][/u] [u][b]Download it here :[/b][/u] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79335/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79335/?[/url]

Snowfall ENB has the same content + I know I missed some weathers, please give me the weather ID if you find one.
To make it work, I put every shader in the enblens.fx file in commentary except the ones for the wanted effects.

Don't forget to endorse the original authors.
author: Monobloc12
